name: places/ChIJH9na1q5ZwokR9I9hqmBOrFQ
formattedAddress: 247 W 11th St #102, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 247 W 11th St #102, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text:
Agnes is an incredibly skilled practitioner. I have been dealing with recurring lower back/muscular injuries for some time. I decided to see Agnes after the latest incident in September. Agnes begins each session by assessing my body and recommending specific treatments based on where my body is weak/tense/strained. Sessions often include some combination or massage, cupping, and acupuncture.

I look forward to my sessions with Agnes because she provides the exact treatment that my body needs to recover. Whether I come to a session with back pain or hip pain or leg pain, Agnes tailors my treatment to not only address that specific area, but she also gets to the root of why I’m dealing with that particular issue. Agnes is masterful at diagnosing and treating the symptoms as well as the underlying issues, which has helped my recovery immensely. I believe Agnes’ ability to diagnose the underlying issues is what makes her so effective and what sets herself apart!

The sessions do not end with treatment. At the end of every session, Agnes dedicates time to suggest and teach targeted exercises to help strengthen areas of weakness. For example, we are currently working on exercises to strengthen my hip because these muscles are weak and contribute to my recurring injuries. Not only does Agnes teach you the exercises in person, she also provides instructional videos for you to watch at home. These exercises have been incredibly beneficial to my recovery and gives me something to work on in between sessions.

I cannot recommend Agnes enough! If you are dealing with body discomfort or pain or recurring injuries, I suggest booking a session at ArTeva Acupuncture immediately!

originalText.text: Agnes is very knowledgeable, attentive, and kind. I booked an appointment because of an injury with my right arm that has not gotten better over the past 6 months despite various forms of treatment. I really appreciate Agnes' holistic and functional approach to determining what could be contributing to the issue I am experiencing. Agnes quickly identified and suggested I work on a few items related to my form and followed up with instructional videos and next steps. I am hopeful that over time this will help alleviate what I am experiencing. If it does not, I am still very happy to have gotten constructive feedback that will help prevent injury/keep me functional as the years pass. Looking forward to incorporating the feedback I received and future appointments. Thank you Agnes!

originalText.text:
Agnes is one of the most skilled therapists that I have ever worked with. I was struggling with shoulder pain for months, and after unsuccessfully seeing a ortho and PT to understand the root of my pain and improve it, I decided I needed a new approach. Through only a few massage sessions and some recommended take-home exercises, I have seen a dramatic improvement in a short period of time. I now have little to no pain after months of pain.

I was also working with Agnes to correct chronic shin splint pain as a result of running. I have never been able to run without shin splits, and no PT or running coach has ever been able to help me resolve this issue. Agnes did one evaluation and suggested a minor adjustment in my gait, which has led to pain free running. It's been incredible.

I think Agnes is so successful in her work because she is incredibly knowledgeable about the human body and brings together expertise from several domains (massage, PT, acupuncture, etc.). This allows her to approach and evaluate one's ailments from a more holistic / whole body approach, which allows her to better identify the root of an issue as opposed to narrowly focusing on how to fix one part of the body. I cannot say enough wonderful things about Agnes and her work. She is truly unique.

originalText.text: Agnes is amazing!  She has a deep understanding of anatomy and physiology, wonderful practice as a massage therapist and acupuncturist, and is a calm and healing presence.  Her studio is light and airy and very beautiful.  She has done an amazing job helping me after a spinal injury, and I would recommend her without reservations to anyone needing acupuncture and massage.

originalText.text: Agnes has helped me tremendously.  I have been suffering with numbness in my leg/foot for over 3 years.  Her knowledge and use of acupuncture, massage, cupping and exercise have contributed to almost complete healing in just a short period of time.  It is hard to find a practitioner with expertise in several modalities, such as Agnes.  I consider myself luck to have found her and her healing abilities.
